pool of player coins: Each player has a pool of Member Share on the MeCarreira.com contract that is distributed over time to loyal supporters. The longer you stake share, the more share you get awarded from that pool and increase your Member share holdings of that player. You can withdraw your stake including your newly earned, free extra share at any time.
erc-20 compatible cryptocurrency: meCarreira is an innovative platform that combines blockchain technology with the world of football, allowing fans to become stakeholders, fans, and investors in rising football talents. Users can trade football players similarly to stocks, buying into uprising talents and potentially profiting as they succeed. By investing, users validate their predictions about players, and the amount of their investment catches the interest of other fans. They can also gain exclusive access to players and special football experiences and items based on the number of shares they hold, reflecting their loyalty. meCarreira distinguishes between Player Fan Clubs (PFC), where users can buy and trade shares, and Official Player Fan Clubs, which offers on top of trading, exclusive rewards and privileges directly from the player. Each time a player share is bought or sold a small transactions fee goes into a pool, stored on the blockchain, which the player can withdraw when claiming his or her own PFC making it his/her official PFC. On that regard a player can monetize his/her personality, by giving back to the most loyal fans in a very fair way, without being associated with greed. The more a community invests in a player's fan club, the higher the likelihood of the player claiming it as their official PFC. As the community grows, users' initial investments appreciates in value, providing potential financial upsides. Whether choosing to hold onto shares for long-term benefits or cashing out, meCarreira aims to democratize football success, ensuring that even small investors have the opportunity for significant gains.
What makes meCarreira unique compared to: What makes meCarreira unique compared to other football platforms?
with every purchase price increases: meCarreira is uniquely positioned as a blockchain-based platform that offers both football fans and aspiring investors the opportunity to trade football players like stocks. Our platform sets itself apart by providing a fair and transparent way to invest in football talent without being associated with greed. The money invested can be withdrawn at any time, ensuring financial flexibility and peace of mind for our users. Additionally, meCarreira offers exclusive access to football players, allowing fans to engage with their favorite athletes on a personal level.
if you buy 100: You are able to get direct access to players and invest in them (they do not get your money). The only thing between you and the player is the blockchain. On meCarreira, being early and commit can be very rewarding which makes it unique to all other social and community platforms.
Is there a cost to join meCarreira?: Is there a cost to join meCarreira?
No there is no cost: No there is no cost. You can sign up for free. It doesn't matter if you are a player or a fan.
Joining meCarreira is absolutely free: Joining meCarreira is absolutely free! We believe in providing an inclusive platform for all football enthusiasts. You can sign up, explore the platform and you only invest in the Player Share(s) you decide.
What is the difference between Player Fa: What is the difference between Player Fan Club (PFC) and Official Player Fan Club (OPFC)?
A PFC, or Player Fan Club, serves as a v: A PFC, or Player Fan Club, serves as a virtual representation of a specific football player, allowing you to invest by buying and trading its shares. Meanwhile, the Official PFC is the claimed representation by the actual footballers, allowing them to receive the portion of the transactions ever conducted under their name, which has been saved in the blockchain. Also, the Official PFC opens up a richer experience for fans, offering them access to unique rewards and exclusive privileges directly from the players themselves.
Why and how does the price of a player g: Why and how does the price of a player go up?
With every purchase the price increases: With every purchase the price increases and with every sale the price decreases. For the price calculation the meCarreira protocol uses a so called Constant Product Market Maker (CPMM).
If you buy for 100 Matic Player A Shares: If you buy for 100 Matic Player A Shares, the next person after you buying for 100 Matic will receive less Shares than you did. If you then sell those shares, you get more than 100 Matic back as the price increased. The same mechanism also applies for when somebody sells after you bought.
How do I buy and sell player tokens on t: How do I buy and sell player shares on the platform?
You must create a wallet first: You must create a wallet first and then visit the profile of the player you like and use the buttons Buy/Sell. You have various options to pay and get paid. The most common ones are Credit Card (Mastercard and Visa), Polygon (MATIC) and USDT. The easiest way is to load up your wallet with Polygon (MATIC).
Your investment is sent into the smart c: Your investment is sent into the smart contract (program code) of the player (PFC or Official PFC) and remains there, safeguarding it from access by both the player and us. This serves as a liquidity pool, facilitating seamless transactions whenever someone wishes to sell. Rest assured, the entirety of your investment (apart from applicable fees) remains on the blockchain, exclusively utilized for determining the player's value. This innovative system guarantees that you can sell your shares at any time without the necessity of locating a buyer.
Can I lose money on meCarreira?: Can I lose money on meCarreira?
Yes, you can. As in any other investment: Yes, you can. As in any other investment, to every upside there is a downside. However, we have built a system that is extremely fair when compared to other assets such as NFTs or Bitcoin. You can always sell and even if you buy shares of a player and nobody else buys, you don’t lose your money (except fees paid) and can sell it at any time to get your investment back.
No, meCarreira is not a gambling platfor: No, meCarreira is not a gambling platform. While you can buy and trade player shares, this isn't traditional gambling. You're not placing bets with uncertain outcomes. Instead, you're investing in the future success of football players, much like you would invest in stocks. It's a strategic and skill-based endeavor where your knowledge of football can lead to potential profits.
Can I buy Player Tokens without having c: Can I buy Player Shares without having cryptocurrencies?
Absolutely! You can directly purchase: Absolutely! You can directly purchase Player Shares with a credit card via our partner, wert.io. Alternatively, you can buy the Polygon (MATIC) cryptocurrency and use it to purchase Player Shares.
How can I get my money back in my bank a: How can I get my money back in my bank account?
Yes, you can get your money: Yes, you can get your money back into your bank account. To achieve this, you first need to sell your player share. Use a regulated exchange like Kraken.com or bitstamp.net. Once your funds are on the exchange, you can securely withdraw them through a regulated European Union entity, regardless of your location. After depositing, you can transfer your funds to any bank account worldwide.
Is my data secure on meCarreira?: Is my data secure on meCarreira?
Yes, we take your data security seriousl: Yes, we take your data security seriously. Protecting your personal information is a top priority for us. We use state-of-the-art security measures and encryption protocols to ensure the safety of your data. Rest assured that your information is stored securely, and we have strict privacy policies in place to safeguard your data and ensure your peace of mind while using meCarreira.
What role does meCarreira play between F: What role does meCarreira play between Fans and Football Players?
meCarreira AG functions as a technology: meCarreira AG functions as a technology provider, responsible for most software development and operations of the main meCarreira.com platform. It also stewards the meCarreira Protocol, connecting the protocol in the metaverse to the real world.
Yes, meCarreira is accessible globally: Yes, meCarreira is accessible globally. Our platform emphasizes the power of community and player influence in shaping Player Fan Clubs (PFCs). We believe in rewarding early backers of a player and strive to highlight talent from diverse backgrounds — from the favelas of Brazil to the streets of Seoul, and even the hinterlands of Africa. Our goal is to spotlight these talents and help them take their next big step. A win-win situation.
Is meCarreira affiliated with any footba: Is meCarreira affiliated with any football clubs or organizations?
No. It's all about the personality of a: No. It's all about the personality of a football player and the community. meCarreira wants to eliminate third-party risks, therefore it's between the player and the fans. Like it should be.
Does it work like Fantasy Football?: Does it work like Fantasy Football?
No, meCarreira operates differently than: No, meCarreira operates differently than Fantasy Football. While Fantasy Football rewards you based on the direct performance of individual players, meCarreira has its own unique set of rules and reward mechanisms. You won't earn rewards solely based on player performance here.
meCarreira is not a traditional videogam: meCarreira is not a traditional videogame where you control football players on a virtual field. However, we do offer a scouting game feature that includes seasonal leaderboards and prizes. This adds an interactive and competitive element to your meCarreira experience.
Why should I invest in a football player: Why should I invest in a football player?
Investing in football players through me: Investing in football players through meCarreira offers the potential for financial returns and exclusive access to player-related content and experiences. It's a unique opportunity to support rising talents, track your investments securely using blockchain technology, and engage with a vibrant football fan community, literally turning your passion into profit.
Is meCarreira a cryptocurrency project l: Is meCarreira a cryptocurrency project like Bitcoin?
No. meCarreira is a blockchain-based eco: No. meCarreira is a blockchain-based ecosystem that is not functioning like Bitcoin. Each player has his/her own share which is the engine of the official PFC (Player Fan Club) club. This share is not a currency but a utility token that can be used to access various items and services. The share is not intended to act as a payment currency but as an access and membership share.
Your money is stored on the blockchain: Your money is stored on the blockchain. Neither meCarreira nor the player directly receives your money. The beauty of this system is that only you can access your funds, ensuring a decentralized and secure experience.
Can I earn money by trading players on m: Can I earn money by trading players on meCarreira?
meCarreira enables to you can use your f: meCarreira enables to you can use your football knowledge to trade players similarly to stocks. You can buy low on emerging talents and sell high when they gain success.
Do you accept payment methods other than: Do you accept payment methods other than MATIC?
Absolutely! We offer a variety of paymen: Absolutely! We offer a variety of payment options to make your experience as seamless as possible. In addition to MATIC, we accept several other cryptocurrencies as well as traditional credit card payments through VISA and Mastercard. For a complete list of accepted payment methods, please visit our dedicated 'Accepted Payment Methods' page on our website.
Can I instantly sell into the pool?: Can I instantly sell into the pool?
Yes, you can! Our platform is designed t: Yes, you can! Our platform is designed to provide continuous liquidity, ensuring that you can sell your shares at any time. The liquidity pool is securely stored in our smart contract, so you never have to worry about your shares being illiquid, not even for a moment.
What are Player Tokens, and how can I us: What are Player Shares, and how can I use them?
Player Tokens on meCarreira represent a: Player Shares on meCarreira represent a share in a Player Fan Club (PFC) or Official PFC. By purchasing these shares, users can actively invest in the rising talents of the football world, much like trading stocks. The amount of shares you hold reflects your knowledge, commitment, and investment in a player. These shares can be traded, and as a player gains recognition, the value of your shares can increase. Furthermore, holding these shares can give users exclusive access to the player, including unique football items and experiences.
What happens if a player I've invested i: What happens if a player I've invested in becomes successful in real life?
If a player you've invested in on meCarr: If a player you've invested in on meCarreira becomes successful in real life, your player shares in that player can appreciate in value, offering you potential profits if you decide to sell. As the player gains traction and community engagement increases, this success might also enhance the benefits you receive, especially if his/her Player Fan Club (PFC) transitions to an Official PFC (OPFC) with exclusive privileges.
How is the “price” of these players dete: How is the “price” of these players determined?
Through supply and demand. The market va: Through supply and demand. The market value of a player is determined through public interest. An Athlete's Brand and fame are enveloped in a Player Fan Club (PFC)  with a limited number of player shares, traded on the global free market like stocks.
Yes, you can get your money back into yo: Yes, you can get your money back into your bank account. To achieve this, you first need to sell your player share. Use a regulated exchange like Kraken.com or bitstamp.net. Once your funds are on the exchange, you can securely withdraw them through a regulated European Union entity, regardless of your location. After depositing, you can transfer your funds to any bank account worldwide.
Is there a community or forum for meCarr: Is there a community or forum for meCarreira users to connect and share experiences?
Absolutely! We have a vibrant community: Absolutely! We have a vibrant community of meCarreira users on our Discord server. It's the perfect place to connect with other users, share experiences, and get the latest updates. We invite you to join the meCarreira family on Discord and be part of our growing community.
team is made of people socialized in tea: The team at MeCarreira is made up of people who were socialised in team sports - mostly football - and for whom sport was a school of life at a young age. Despite our very different professional backgrounds, the flame of passion for sport and especially for football burns in every single member of the MeCarreira team. Creating something truly great and special with MeCarreira motivates us every day to go the extra mile over and over again. This spirit and this cohesion makes MeCarreira something special for us and we hope for you to.
why each member belief: Why does each single team member belief in what MeCarreira is standing for?
heinz_ernst_team_message: When I first had the vision of MeCarreira, the main trigger was to enable young talented footballers to make themselves known through the internet. I am convinced that as talented players like Mané, Messi or Ronaldo where not discovered in the past and we as football fans have not had the pleasure to admire them in big games. So my motivation is that only pure talent, not connections or luck, should be the deciding factor in whether a young footballer goes far, no matter where he is born in the world. I am very excited that we are now creating exactly this kind of platform with MeCarreira!
Heinz is a former professional footballe: Heinz is a former professional footballer that has left football to pursue his business career. He has run a very successful insurance company for over 20 years and has been involved as founder in various tech projects
Alex started coding with 12: Alex started coding with 12 and has been involved as CTO in various tech startups after he moved out of the banking sector as software architect. He is an early cryptocurrency adopter and has launched various web3 and crypto projects
Philipp was a successful professional: Philipp was a successful professional football player, with multi-year stints in top clubs such as Borussia Dortmund, Liverpool and FC Basel as well as the Swiss National Team. Today he runs multiple businesses in the football, tech and gaming sector.
Marco held executive positions: Marco held executive positions at SEHV, ATP Tour, UEFA and Young Boys (holds UEFA A License). He is the author of two Amazon bestseller books on Branding and is member in several Executive Boards.
alex_team_message: We wanted to build a platform where the digital possibilities offered by the Metaverse together with the Blockchain technology can be easily used by footballers to develop their careers and personal brands also virtually, both pros and amateurs as well as talented young players, anywhere in the world! I am very satisfied with the outcome. Let the game begin!
marco_team_message1: The possibilities offered to footballers with
marco_team_message2: are fascinating. It is the concretization of what I theorized in my book
marco_team_message3: where the journey in community management and fan engagement leads to, when you use the opportunities that the platform economy offers. Combining this with the world's most popular entertainment content  football, is highly attractive for all stakeholders involved, namely the players, their family & friends and football fans in general.
philipp_degen_message: Bringing football to the blockchain and connect talent with fans directly is a win win situation for players and fans. Community based growth is the standard nowadays for almost all business sectors, so its just natural that football applies that too. Being a part of the game and have the ability to earn money from the comfort of your own home, is exactly what many young innovators are looking for and meCarreira solves exactly that.
thomas_team_message2: offers to footballers both pros and young players, are really impressive. When I was first presented with the platform, I thought, 'shit' why didn't I think of that? In fact every footballer can issue his own Member Share and then manage it, and this is as far as I know, unique in the world. As a football pro, a passionate amateur or a promising talent, you hold the reins of your digital personal brand in your own hands and can build up a second lucrative pillar for yourself on
thomas_team_message3: parallel to your active career; how cool is that!”
mathias_team_message: platform offers in football are absolutely fascinating, both for the seasoned professional footballer, who can build up a second highly attractive mainstay here alongside his career on the pitch, and for the talented young footballer, who can document his career digitally on the blockchain and thus receive increased attention. I am convinced that MeCarreira. com has the potential to become as important in the digital world of football as Transfermarkt.com is in the real world today. MeCarreira.com combines the megatrends of personal branding on Social media and the Blockchain technology in an impressive way. Making my contribution here to MeCarreira.com taking off motivates me a lot!
alessandra_team_message: “I am fascinated by how MeCarreira brings together technology, people and art and how it enables every football player to present his/her career, reaching fans by gaining greater attention. In this way, everyone can create it’s own community and getting in closer contact with the fans. The way how the players create their own share and NFT's are just amazing! I asked myself why there was not such a platform before and I am thrilled that it was finally created!”
heinz ended his career: Heinz ended his professional football career successfully to pursue his other passion: Business. He became a successfull entrepeneur with a sense for technical innovation.
marco held executive positions: Marco held executive positions at SEHV, ATP Tour, UEFA and Young Boys (holds UEFA A License). He is the author of two Amazon bestseller books on Branding and is member in several Executive Boards.
alex been programming since childhood: Alex has been programming since his childhood and has co-founded as CTO various tech startups after he moved out of the banking sector where he worked as software developer and architect. He is an early cryptocurrency adopter and passionate blockchain enthusiast.
mathias held executive: Mathias held executive positions as manager and sportdirector in several Professional Football Clubs like Grasshopper Zürich, FC Winterthur and Shkendja Tetovo! He was also the Marketing Manager of Xherdan Shaqiri , Breel Embolo and Jil Teichmann (Tennis)!
content is king: Like Mari Smith said: “Content is King but engagement is Queen and the lady rules the house.” Alessandra thinks of this quote when she does her work. So she lets her creative skills flow into all important components of a good social media management and creates strategies to reach people and create communities.
thomas is a pioneer: Thomas is a pioneer of the Swiss e-sports scene. As one of the first FIFA coaches worldwide, he still coaches the best FIFA players today. For more than two years he is also responsible for the topic eFootball at the Swiss Football Association.
get a digital piece of your favorite pla: Get a digital piece of your favorite player
we created meCarreira to celebrate: We created MeCarreira.com to celebrate the most fascinating game on earth, football. We at MeCarreira believe very much in the power of the democratization thanks to the platform economy and that fore Digital Assets are the new Social Media.
found by swiss enterpreneurs: Founded in Switzerland by SwissEntrepreneurs, MeCarreira.com is established in the center of the Cryptocurrency (Crypto Valley), Financial (Swiss Banking) and football (FIFA) world. The platform is mobile first and modern, participation is very simple and as a Swiss company, MeCarreira AG is 100% trustworthy and secure.

whether you are professional player: Whether you're already a professional player or an up-and-coming talent, you have the opportunity to take control of your footballing destiny through your own share and build a community that will support you throughout your career. In the beginning, it will probably be parents, family and friends, and then increasingly experts and then in the course of the career, more and more also the fans.
you dont get results: You don’t get results by focusing on results. You get results by focusing on actions that produce results.
find yourself: To find yourself, think for yourself.
being on edge not safe: Being on the edge isn’t as safe, but the view is better.
our aim is empowering players: Our aim is empowering players and fans to directly interact with each other and to mutually benefit in a fair and entertaining way from the possibilities the Metaverse and the Blockchain technology offers.
players can extend market: Players can extend their market value beyond the football pitch and earn popularity and are empowered to unfold their career in the digital world.
everybody that loves football: Everybody that loves football can have access to the exclusive community of his/her favorite players, buy and sell share of their favorite players and get a collection of NFTs from their heroes.
new generation of talented players: The new generation of talented young players are enabled to take their destiny in their own hands, by pushing their virtual career from home (anywhere in the world!) while on parallel, focusing as well on the real one on the pitch.

each player contract goes: Each player contract goes through 2 stags once it is launched, with each stage having various different functionalities enabled. Every player, no matter how famous has to go through Stage 1 to reach Stage 2. Stage one is called “Subscription” and stage 2 is named “PRO”. Becoming Pro therefore means on meCarreira that the player moves from Stage 1 to Stage 2.
the way to move from: The way to move from Stage 1 to Stage 2 (becoming PRO) is by having enough market value and enough supporters. The exact requirements to become Pro are set by meCarreira but are publicly visible in the factsheet (available on website). They can vary over time, depending on the activity.
players that never reach: Players that never reach enough momentum to become PRO on meCarreira will stay in Stage 1 (Subscription) indefinite but as trading will never be deactivated and share can always be bought and sold, the player might reach the criteria to become pro at a later stage.
once a player reaches: Once a player reaches PRO (Stage 2), features such as NFT, Auctions, Draws, Votes and Staking are enabled. PRO Players are traded on public exchanges and the liquidity is moved to public exchanges (like UNISWAP).
to buy Player-Coins you: To buy Player-Share you can chose between Credit-Card and Cryptocurrency (Polygon). The easiest and fastest way is to load up your wallet with Polygon (Matic) cryptocurrency and then buy directly Player-Share. You can buy MATIC (Polygon) on almost any major cryptocurrency exchange and then send it to your wallet you have on meCarreira.com. You can also use the “Get MATIC” button In your wallet and buy Polygon (Matic) with your Credit-Card and receive them directly into your wallet. All Player-Share can be bought with Polygon (MATIC).
alternatively, you can use: Alternatively, you can use credit-card to buy Players share directly. If you chose to pay with Credit- Card, we link you with our Credit-Card Provider Wert.io that is a licensed and regulated entity in the EU. They will process your card safely and convert your Money from your card automatically into Polygon (MATIC) and then buy Member Share with that and send it to your wallet. You do not have to do anything but to chose the amount of player-share you want to buy and all the rest happens in the background.
whenever you sell Player-Coins: Whenever you sell Player-Share, you get Polygon (Matic) back to your wallet. In order to cash out Polygon as well, you can sell them on any exchange or convert them into USDT for example on Uniswap exchange . You can cash out easily back to your bank account with regulated exchanges such as Kraken.
drafting is available: Drafting is available for Players in Stage 1 (Subscription) and Stage 2 (PRO). Every player can draft up to 5 other players at any given time. This means a Player can draft more than 5 players over time but can never have more than 5 active drafts.
when a player drafts: When a player drafts another player, it is publicly visible and it has benefits for Drafter (the one who initiated it) and the draftee (the one who got drafted). The Drafter will get paid cash if the player he/she drafted will become PRO (Stage 2). It is a kickback fee for supporting him/her to success. The draftee benefits before then every time someone buys share from the drafter, the system automatically takes a percentage (usually 2%) and buys share of the draftee.
John buys for 100 USD share of Player A.
2% (2 USD) are used to buy coins of Play: 2% (2 USD) are used to buy share of Player B.
john receives 98 USD: John receives 98 USD of Player A share and 2 USD worth of PlayerB share.
players getting drafted: Players getting drafted by high profile players will almost definitely have the best chances to reach PRO themselves.
voting works that way that: Voting works that way that the Player launches a vote where he/she places a specific question with couple answers as options. Then share holders can reply and the more share you have, the more voting power you got. If you own 10% of all share, your answer is much more powerful than someone with 0.5% of share only. Votes are on the blockchain and cannot be faked or manipulated. All you have to do is to select an answer and click on “vote”.
NFTs are digital artworks: NFTs are digital artworks issued on the blockchain. Every NFT gets his own share that represents the ownership of that NFT. NFTs can be sent around or sold again on third party platform such as OpenSea or Rarible. The owner of the NFT is the owner of the artwork and the claim(see below) and owns all the rights to it.
on meCarreira players: On meCarreira players are the issuers of NFTs. They ultimately decide which NFTs are launched and how they are launched(Auction, Raffle, Charity, etc.).
auctions are done for NFTs: Auctions are done for NFTs where the player selects a certain NFT and decides to auction it off. The only way to participate in the auction is by owning Member Share and stake them. Every auction has an end date and once passed, the highest bidder gets the NFT including all “claiming rights” to it and is free to do with the NFT what he/she wants. Only the share of the highest bidder are locked and once the auction is won, taken and moved into the liquidity pool and therefore given back to the community. If you are the highest bidder, keep in mind that your share are locked until the auction is finished.
raffles or sometimes referred: Raffles or sometimes referred to as Draws are a type of lottery where the player selects an NFT and lets everybody participate in the raffle until a certain deadline has been reached. Then a random selection takes place and a lucky winner is drawn and gets the NFT for free. The more share you have staked, the higher your chance is to win in the draw. Someone with 1000 share staked has 10 times more chance to win than someone with 100. Once you won the NFT, you are free to send or sell it as you please. In order to participate you must stake and then actively participate by clicking the participation button. This is to prevent inactive owners from winning anything.
some NFTs can have a claim: Some NFTs can have a claim. A claim is basically a right to redeem something. Real World Items such as match worn boots, jerseys or other items but also experiences can be placed into a claim and the NFT represents this claim, making the owner of the NFT the owner of the claim. This allows the owner to sell it digitally without having to send them around. Claims can be redeemed through meCarreira where meCarreira AG acts as bridge between the player(issuer) and NFT holder(redeemer) but meCarreira has no impact on what players place into their NFTs as they are the issuers.
player-Coins can only be: Player-Share can only be sent once a player reaches PRO status. At any time, they can be bought and sold but not sent. The reason the sending is limited is that we want to prevent secondary markets to show up before the player has been through its subscription phase. The share are never locked and they are in your wallet at any time.
once the player reaches: Once the player reaches PRO, you can send those share like any other Cryptocurrency to anywhere you want or sell them.

you have been verified and will be able: You have been verified and will be able to launch your official Fan Club as soon as the app is launched and we pick your profile to be launched. You will be notified
mario played in the: Mario played in the 1. Bundesliga as well as for the Swiss National Team with which he participated in the FIFA World Cup 2010. Following his successfull football career, he put his focus into supporting young talents with his own sports agency. Mario is a pioneer in female athlete scouting and manages a great selection of professional female athletes.

thanks_to_the_extensive_use: The direct interaction between players and fans is ensured through the use of the most modern blockchain technology. We guarantee a professional and transparent environment for all parties involved.

we created meCarreira: We created MeCarreira.com to celebrate the most fascinating game on earth, football. We at MeCarreira believe very much in the power of the democratization thanks to the platform economy and that fore Digital Assets are the new Social Media. Founded in Switzerland by Swiss Entrepreneurs, MeCarreira.com is established in the center of the Cryptocurrency (Crypto Valley), Financial (Swiss Banking) and football (FIFA) world. The platform is mobile first and modern, participation is very simple and as a Swiss company, MeCarreira AG is 100% trustworthy and secure.
philipp_team_message: “The platform is unique and fits the current development in sport, where community building is an essential step in moving your career forward off the pitch. Sport athletes and influencers are the backbone of this ecosystem and meCarreira.com is the perfect tool for the community to be a part of the game and not just the consumer. I wish such channels existed when I was playing professionally in the English Premier League and German Bundesliga”
earn from your skills: Earn from your skills as a football fan and turn your knowledge into real money. You feel a player is just before a big breakthrough, then buy his or her share. With success, it is likely the share will appreciate in value as more fans want to buy the share.
start collecting like: Start collecting like you never did before. Gain access to exclusive items and acquire them from the players directly or win them with a little bit of luck. Whether you enjoy real world items such as worn shirts or digital items like NFTs, we have you covered.
by buying coins of upcoming: By buying share of upcoming talents, you can actively support them and give them a chance to be discovered and your efforts are not in vain as you benefit from their success. To the moon!
get started easily by creating: Get started easily by creating a wallet using your email or connect with your existing web3 wallet (like Metamask or Coinbase Wallet)
conveniently top up your account: Conveniently top up your account using Credit Card or Apple Pay if you're new to the world of cryptocurrency. Experienced users can seamlessly deposit a range of cryptocurrencies (via the polygon blockchain) to their accounts.

unlock exclusive perks: Unlock exclusive perks as a Member Share holder, with access to special events and collectibles. Reward your fandom by claiming exciting rewards and celebrating your position as one of the premier fans.
players can reach: Players can reach 4 different status levels, each one enabling more features for players and fans. In order to achieve those levels, players must achieve a certain market value. Diamond level is the ultimate level, only high potential players will reach and it enables all the features of the platform like NFTs and Voting.

prize_pool_live_info: The prize pool is growing with every trade. Each trade raises a small percentage of the total trade size into the pool. We call it the prize pool fee. Each season has it's own pool. The more trading happens during the time period of the season, the more money will be in the prize pool for that season. Additionally, donations can be made into the prize pool
participants_info: This is the total amount of users/wallets that have participated in this particular season.
paid_info: The amount of Participants that are getting paid. If the value is for example 10, this means that 10 users/wallets are sharing the prize pool at the end of the season.
what_is_mecarreira1: meCarreira is an innovative platform that combines blockchain technology with the world of football, allowing fans to become stakeholders, fans, and investors in rising football talents. Users can trade football players similarly to stocks, buying into uprising talents and potentially profiting as they succeed.
what_is_mecarreira2: By investing, users validate their predictions about players, and the amount of their investment catches the interest of other fans. They can also gain exclusive access to players and special football experiences and items based on the number of shares they hold, reflecting their loyalty.
what_is_mecarreira3: meCarreira distinguishes between Player Fan Clubs (PFC), where users can buy and trade shares, and Official Player Fan Clubs, which offer on top of trading, exclusive rewards and privileges directly from the player. Each time a player share is bought or sold a small transaction fee goes into a pool, stored on the blockchain, which the player can withdraw when claiming his or her own PFC making it his/her Official PFC. In that regard, a player can monetize his/her personality, by giving back to the most loyal fans in a very fair way, without being associated with greed. The more a community invests in a PFC, the higher the likelihood of the player claiming it as their Official PFC (or OPFC). As the community grows, users' initial investments appreciate in value, providing potential financial upsides. Whether choosing to hold onto shares (like shares in stocks) for long-term benefits or cashing out, meCarreira aims to democratize football success, ensuring that even small investors have the opportunity for significant gains.
meCarreira is uniquely positioned: meCarreira is uniquely positioned as a blockchain-based platform that offers both football fans and aspiring investors the opportunity to trade football players like stocks. Our platform sets itself apart by providing a fair and transparent way to invest in football talent without being associated with greed. The money invested can be withdrawn at any time, ensuring financial flexibility and peace of mind for our users. Additionally, meCarreira offers exclusive access to football players, allowing fans to engage with their favorite athletes on a personal level.
You are able to get: You are able to get direct access to players and invest in them (they do not get your money). The only thing between you and the player is the blockchain. On meCarreira, being early and committed can be very rewarding which makes it unique to all other social and community platforms.
A PFC serves as a virtual: A PFC serves as a virtual representation of a specific football player, allowing you to invest by buying and trading its shares (like shares in stocks). Meanwhile, the Official PFC (or OPFC) is the claimed representation by the actual footballers, allowing users to buy, trade, and access personal items issued by the players.
When you buy tokens of: When you buy shares of Player A with 100 MATIC, the ensuing transaction will reflect a higher price per share due to the prior purchase. Hence, the next person purchasing with 100 MATIC will receive fewer player shares than you did. Conversely, if you decide to sell those shares later, you would likely receive more than 100 MATIC in return due to the increased price per share. This mechanism continues to operate with each buy and sell transaction, dynamically adjusting the share price based on market activity. Similarly, if someone sells shares after your purchase, the price per share would decrease, affecting the amount of MATIC received from subsequent transactions.

hit_the_buy_button: Hit the BUY button to start trading
here_you_enter_amount: Here you enter the amount you want to spend.
now_hit_buy: Now hit BUY to take you to the next step
choose_your_payment_method: Choose your payment method: Credit Card or MATIC (Polygon), with MATIC being the fastest option
your_buy_transaction: Your BUY transaction is successfully complete: sent (first tick) and confirmed (second tick) on the Blockchain
gain_xp_for_your_buy_order: Gain XP for your BUY order, enhancing your position on the leaderboard and increasing your level. You’re also notified when leveling up
click_on_the_amount: Click on the Amount to visit your wallet
alternatively_click: Alternatively, click on the wallet in your navigation.
you_can_deposit_various_cryptocurrencies: You can deposit different cryptocurrencies into your wallet, only Polygon-based ones. Please read and acknowledge the warning message.
your_unique_blockchain_wallet_address: Your unique blockchain wallet address is displayed. It's similar to a bank account number, allowing you to receive crypto or send it to yourself. This section also shows supported cryptocurrencies like Wrapped ETH or USDT.
of_course_you_can_deposit: Of course, you can deposit using a credit card. Just click on the dedicated section and follow the steps. Be informed that transactions are securely handled by our partner, wert.io, ensuring your credit card information is not stored by us.
you_can_sell_your_player_tokens: You can sell your Player Shares ANYTIME via your wallet, player lists, or player detail pages.
click_on_sell: Click on SELL in order to sell your Shares
you_can_enter_the_amount: You can enter the amount of shares of that Player you want to sell. You are shown the maximum amount of Shares you own and can sell. Please enter 10
choose_a_payout_in: Choose a payout in various Polygon-based cryptocurrencies, with MATIC often being the fastest and most price-efficient option.
confirm_your_choice: Confirm your choice by selecting the Cryptocurrency(MATIC) button
your_sell_transaction: Your SELL transaction is successfully complete: sent (first tick) and confirmed (second tick) on the Blockchain.
you_have_now_seen: You have now seen how easy it is to buy and sell players like stocks. Time to get real and grind
complete_all_parts: Complete all parts and receive 200 XP to get you started
click_the_first_banner: Click the first banner for the Seasons page or use the top right menu link. Try clicking the banner now.
each_season_has_deadline: Each season has a deadline; your goal is to accumulate as much XP as possible. Seasons refresh continuously, ensuring ongoing challenges. We don’t do summer breaks.
the_prize_pool_is_money: The prize pool is the collected money from every trade (buy and sell). It rewards the best traders (most XP) of that season.
participants_is_the_number: PARTICIPANTS is the number of traders that have collected XP in this season. PAID is the number of traders that will share the prize pool at the end of the season. You want to collect as much XP as possible, to be amongst the top traders.
the_in_the_money_list: The IN THE MONEY list shows all players that would currently be able to draw from the prize pool. Keep in mind, this is a momentary view and it can change until the very last second.
explore_trader_profiles: Explore trader profiles by clicking on them, revealing details like username, level, and seasonal XP.
click_on_trader_now: To continue, Click on a trader now.
in_gold_displayed: In gold displayed you see the current level. Coloured on the right side, you see the XP required to reach the next level. Each level is harder to reach with a maximum level of 99.
the_wallet_address_is: The wallet address is the blockchain address of that trader. Click on the address and you will be taken to the block explorer. For advanced users only.
review_each_traders: Review each trader's total investment, number of active trades, and Lifetime XP. These are the 3 core values.
see_all_the_players: See all the Players this trader is holding right now. You can see the number of shares as well as the USD value of those shares at this moment.
if_you_want_to_see: If you want to see more traders, you can visit the overall leaderboard.
click_scouts_now: Click Fans now in the navigation
view_three_core_values: View 3 core values to see the activity: registered fans, total 24h XP from everyone, and platform trade count.
the_top_five_scouts: The top 5 fans are traders that have the most cash invested at this moment. Those traders have either invested a lot of money or had made their holdings by entering early into fanclubs at very low cost.
the_rest_of_the_traders: The rest of the traders is listed in the Leaderboard. Looking for someone specific? Enter the username or wallet into the search field. Maybe we see you soon in our Top 5 Fan list? Thank you for taking this section of the tour.
staking_tokens_is_locking: Staking shares is locking them in for a short amount of time to reap XP of that player. Many features require staking, like messages and voting. You can stake from any player’s detail page but also form your wallet directly.
the_first_time_you_want: The first time you want to stake for each player, you have to approve first which requires a blockchain transaction.
here_you_can_click: Here you can click the minus icon for unstaking (if you have a staking balance) or the plus icon for staking. Default selection is always the plus icon.
input_the_staking_amount: Input the staking amount manually, use the slider, or select a percentage. Your total player shares available for staking are displayed. If you wish to stake more, buy additional player shares first.
select_max_button: Select the `MAX` button and press on Stake
staked_tokens_are_locked: Staked shares are locked for a minimum of 100 hours. During this period, you accumulate XP per hour for each staked share. The accrued XP will be displayed after the minimum staking time has elapsed. You can then collect the XP or continue accumulating it. Note that collecting XP restarts the 100-hour lock period.
the_xp_earned: The XP earned shows up after the initial lock period is over. Once you COLLECT, you will have an initial locking period again. If you unstake, you automatically collect the XP. You do not have to collect beforehand.
we_display_the_price: We display the price per player share in USD as well as the total amount in USD that has to be paid. Every trade impacts the price of the shares for the next buyer and seller. The price impact of trade displays how much your trade impacts the future price. Prices are recalculated every 30s because as any new trade in the meantime would have changed the price for your trade as well
available quantity min: Available quantity must be at least
field is required and only non-decimal n: Field is required and only non-decimal number
no trades so far: No trades so far. Be the first and
tap on share option safari: Tap on Share option on your Safari Browser, scroll down to the bottom of menu & select
visit our socials: Visit our socials & comment on our posts or join our Discord and Request the Code
you do not have app access: You do not have access to the app yet
are you certain proceed: Are you certain you want to proceed with claiming FreeXP?
insufficient voting balance: Your voting balance is insufficient for obtaining stake player shares
You can only post once within a 24-hour: You can only post once within a 24-hour period.
Your public instagram profile url requir: Your public instagram profile url required
price is fixed and paid in your tokens: Price is fixed and paid in your shares
highest bidder wins at end of auction: Highest bidder wins at end of auction
every fan can participate with a lucky w: Every fan can participate with a lucky winner
only the best fans can have it: Only the best fans can have it
Auction finishes on (max 0 days from now: Auction finishes on (max 0 days from now)
site_undergoing_scheduled_maintenance: Our website is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance. We should be right back shortly. Thank you for your patience.
the cutoff date: The Cutoff date must be greater than the current date.
winners count min: Winners count must be at least
shares and stake them to earn XP and be: Shares and stake them to earn XP and be eligible to vote
transfermarkt link description: Please Enter the link to transfermarkt in order for us to verify that this footballer exists. Paste link with entire URL.
your_vote_matters_description: On meCarreira, users have the ability to propose football players they wish to see listed. Upon receiving a request, we verify the accuracy of the player's data and then release the request to our user base for voting. Once a player request reaches the voting threshold, their profile will be created, and the launch date will be determined by meCarreira, typically within a few business days. This feature was designed to empower the community, giving them control over who is featured on the platform.
investable cash description: Investable Cash represents the total sum of all your cryptocurrencies that you can utilize to purchase player shares. This encompasses Polygon, USDT, USDC, WETH, and WBTC.
Reqest For Listing_content: A user has submitted a request to list a football player for voting on the platform, awaiting approval.
Voting Launched_content: The voting process has been initiated, allowing users to vote on whether the requested player should be listed for trading.
Enough Votes Reached_content: The required number of votes has been met, approving the listing of the player on the trading platform.
Trading Started_content: Trading has officially begun for the listed player, and users can now buy, sell, or trade.
Contact With Player_content: Initial contact has been made with the player or their representative to discuss claiming the Fan Club and making it official.
Fan Club Claimed_content: The Player has successfully claimed his fan club, unlocking special privileges and content exclusive to members.
Posed On Instagram_content: The Player has announced his official Fan Club on Instagram and his active participation in his official Fan Club on meCarreira, to get more Fans involved.
Shareholder Dividends_content: Dividends, in the form of Items and Events, like worn shirts or meet and greets have been issued to shareholders by the player. The ultimate reason on why to buy player shares in the first place.
we_collaborate_with: We collaborate with a licensed and regulated business provider, wert.io, to manage all credit card transactions and processes. Any correspondence and communication regarding your credit card transaction will be directly between you and wertio. Please be aware that you will receive emails from mailto:support@wert.io regarding your credit card transaction.
